pahuwenidath mawa gedara thiyala anith aya giya umbaawa balanna ispirithaleta.giya kattiya aapahu gedara ena sadde ahunath teliwishanaya dihama balanawa arenna ee ena aya diha balanna uwamanawak thibune na mata.umbae aachchi mage issarahata aawa.eya suruttuwak wage undikarapu mokadda ekak dothinma thurulkaran.eya eka paratama ee undikarapu suruttuwa mage athata dunna.hak...umbae muna witharak ithuruwenna anith okkoma othala.amme umbae mune katha....adatath mata ipadichchagaman podi ewun kisi lassanak na.as dekath piyagana hinen wage thol dekin monawada ura ura....melo rahak na....ee madiwata bariya....upanthekta podi ekek wada nogaththa, hurathal nokarapu mage odokkuwe dan umbaa....umbaawa allannath bayayi, podiweyi kiyala.mama pinokiyo wage hitiya hellennewath nathuwa.umbae aachchi umbaawa othala thibuna shit eka ayin kala.anna ethakotanam umbae manussa penuma aawa tikak.napiyakuth andagana miki mawus wage umbaa hitiya.
